short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter Google Calendar events containing user-specified keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily filter in your Google Calendar based on keywords you define. Streamline your calendar view and focus on what matters most to you.

Key Features:
• Customizable keyword filtering
• Easy-to-use interface

How to use:
1. Install the extension
2. Click on the extension icon
3. Enter your keywords
4. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused calendar view

Works with the latest version of Google Calendar.

Your privacy is important to us. This extension does not collect or store any personal data.
